General.Name: Road Environment Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Road Environment Technology.,Ltd provides solid wastewater treatment and disposal services in China. It offers river and lake slit, engineering mud, industrial slag and sludge, and municipal sludge treatment services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Wuhan, China.
General.Address: Building 4, Block E, Optics Valley Software Park, Wuhan, China, 430075
